contents.text: Thank you for calling Fossa in San Francisco, your autopilot for dependency tracking, license compliance, and attribution notices.
Press 1 for Sales and product information.
Press 1 to schedule a personalized product demo.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for demo scheduling.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized demo of Fossa’s dependency tracking and license compliance platform.
I’d like to schedule a product demo to see how Fossa automates license compliance.
I want to schedule a personalized walkthrough of Fossa’s dependency-tracking features and CI/CD integration.
Could you help me schedule a personalized product demo, please?
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how Fossa can track dependencies in my research code.

contents.text: Press 2 for pricing and licensing options.
One moment please while we transfer you to our pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing tiers and licensing options for my organization.
I need detailed pricing and licensing options for our software compliance needs.
I need a detailed breakdown of Fossa’s pricing tiers and enterprise license seat costs.
I need someone to explain your pricing plans and licensing options.
I need information on academic pricing and licensing plans for Fossa.

contents.text: Press 2 for Support and technical assistance.
Please hold while we connect you to a compliance specialist.

navigationGoals: Clarify license compliance requirements for my current project.
I want to confirm that our project’s dependencies are license compliant.
I have a question about ensuring GPL compliance across my project’s dependency graph.
I have questions about meeting license compliance requirements.
I want clarification on MIT vs. GPL license compatibility for my project.

contents.text: Press 2 for developer tool setup and integration support.
Thank you for your patience. A support engineer will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Set up Fossa’s developer tools and troubleshoot integration with our CI pipeline.
I need help integrating Fossa’s CLI tool into our build pipeline.
I need assistance setting up the Fossa CLI and integrating it into our Jenkins pipeline.
I’m having trouble setting up and integrating your developer tools; can you assist?
Help me integrate Fossa’s CLI tool into my GitHub Actions workflow for my physics simulations.
